CRaSH is a shell for [[Java Content Repository>>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Content_repository_API_for_Java]] that comes
bundled as a war file to deploy in eXo Portal 2.5 or [[GateIn>>http://www.jboss.org/gatein]]. It provides a file system view
of a repository.
